text: Cesare Casadei (born in 10 January 2003) is an Italian professional footballer. He plays Torino in Serie A. == Club career == In 2023, he joined Chelsea. In 2023, he joined Reading on loan. In 2023, he joined Leicester City on loan. In 2025, he joined Torino. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Living people Category:2003 births Category:Italian footballers Category:Chelsea F.C. players Category:Leicester City F.C. players Category:Reading F.C. players Category:Premier League players
title: Cesare Casadei
